snippet: Three young men, two of them with ties to Auburn’s football team, were killed and three others were wounded during a pool party on Saturday night.
abstract: Ladarious K Phillips, Edward Christian and Demario Pitts are killed and three others are wounded during a shooting at a pool party near the Auburn University campus in Auburn, Alabama; search continues for suspect Desmonte D Leonard, who has been charged with three counts of capital murder in the shooting.

byline.contributor: Campbell Robertson contributed reporting from New Orleans, Robbie Brown from Atlanta, and Pete Thamel from Boston.

lead_paragraph: Three young men, two of them with ties to Auburn’s football team, were killed and three others were wounded during a pool party on Saturday night.

headline.seo: Auburn Shooting Kills Three, Including Two Ex-Football Players
headline.main: Three Killed in Shooting Near Auburn University
headline.print_headline: Three Killed in Shooting Near Auburn University
